questions.question: Which best describes why Charles Babbage design thed Difference Engine?
questions.answerChoiceA: To automate the creation of logarithmic tables

questions.answerChoiceB: Inventing the electromechanical punch card tabulator
questions.answerChoiceC: Creating the first data storage algorithm
questions.answerChoiceD: Introducing magnetic tape for data storage

questions.answerChoiceB: The absence of strong labor unions
questions.answerChoiceC: Lack of skilled labor in the US
questions.answerChoiceD: Absence of established traditions in American businesses

questions.question: What was the primary purpose of Herman Hollerith's tabulating machine in the 1890 U.S. Census?

questions.answerChoiceA: Development of the first modern computer
questions.answerChoiceB: Creation of the first computer programming language
questions.answerChoiceD: Design of the first graphical user interface
questions.answerChoiceE: Invention of the first algorithm for a computing machine

questions.question: What was the original meaning of the word 'computer' before World War II?
questions.answerChoiceA: An electronic device for data processing
questions.answerChoiceB: A person who performed mathematical calculations
questions.answerChoiceC: A machine for automating office tasks

questions.question: What was the primary use of the ENIAC computer?
questions.answerChoiceB: Creating the first graphical user interface
questions.answerChoiceD: Calculating artillery firing tables for the U.S. Army

questions.answerChoiceC: It standardized the architecture of mainframe computers
questions.answerChoiceD: Development of the first software operating system

questions.answerChoiceA: It was the first digital computer
questions.answerChoiceB: Inspired the creation of the World Wide Web
questions.answerChoiceC: Led to the invention of the microprocessor
questions.answerChoiceD: Introduced the concept of virtual reality
questions.answerChoiceE: Provided a blueprint for graphical user interfaces

questions.question: What was the main purpose of the Turing Test, proposed by Alan Turing?
questions.answerChoiceA: To determine a computer's ability to think like a human
questions.answerChoiceB: To measure a computer's processing speed
questions.answerChoiceD: To evaluate the effectiveness of artificial intelligence
questions.answerChoiceE: To assess the accuracy of data processing

questions.answerChoiceE: Creation of the first operating system

questions.question: What was the key advancement made by the Apple Macintosh in 1984?
questions.answerChoiceB: Creation of the first mobile operating system
questions.answerChoiceC: Development of the first graphical user interface
questions.answerChoiceE: Implementation of the first wireless networking

questions.answerChoiceA: It was the first computer used in space
questions.answerChoiceB: Pioneered the development of modern smartphones
questions.answerChoiceC: Led to the creation of the first computer virus

questions.question: What was the main contribution of Douglas Engelbart's oN-Line System (NLS)?
questions.answerChoiceA: It was the first system to use hypertext
questions.answerChoiceC: Created the first word processing software
questions.answerChoiceD: Developed the first multiplayer online game
questions.answerChoiceE: Invented the first graphical web browser

questions.answerChoiceB: Creating the first online social network
